scenario_text.value: Still, look at all these spiderwebs...
Eeeugh, the floor’s all sticky! Feels gross!

Yeah. But this is a little too big for
a spider’s den...

And aren’t these threads way too thick for
spiderwebs? And so sticky...
They aren’t exactly easy to cut, either!

Yeah, this is no ordinary web... What’s going
on here?
This is no ordinary spiderweb, is it?
